###############
Learning Cassie
###############

This guide will walk you through the basic concepts in Cassie, and how it can
make your asynchronous code more structured. Along the way, and through the
examples, you'll learn about `Deferreds`_, `Promises`_, how to manage multiple
dependencies, etc. Stick with me!
